title: TJ Maxx Hall of Fame
description:
This week June is late, but right on time, bathrobe and all. The gals lean into the power of ‘voting for yourself,' Jessica unveils the The Deep Dive Pinterest page to a speechless June, and they ask the question: when do you show the butt crack? Then, grab a tissue because American playwright, poet and essayist (also Jessica’s husband) Dan O’Brien joins to read a few absolutely beautiful poems from his new book, Our Cancers. And don’t worry, this is the first and LAST time a husband will be on the podcast.

The PinTERest is active! Follow here: https://www.pinterest.com/thedeepdive

You can order Dan O'Brien's books here: https://press.uchicago.edu/ucp/books/book/distributed/O/bo120950197.html
https://www.amazon.com/Story-that-Happens-Playwriting-Childhood/dp/1628973838/

You can follow The Deep Dive on Twitter @thedeepdivepod
June Diane Raphael @MsJuneDiane on Twitter @junediane on Instagram
Jessica St. Clair @Jessica_StClair on Twitter @stclairjessica on Instagram
Check out the Jane Club at www.janeclub.com
Send us your The Deep Dive theme or any questions you might have to thedeepdive@earwolf.com
author: thedeepdive@earwolf.com (Earwolf & Jessica St. Clair, June Diane Rapheal)
